:: 2 ::
5. Nature:- You are the only son of us No. 1 and the adopted brother of us No. 2. Out of our love for you, we have decided to give you some immovable property and to provide you with a good life. We have taken possession of our property, that is, the property acquired by our ancestors and inherited by us, and have registered the said property in the name of us No. 1 in the name of Munugodu Gram Panchayat. We, the only ones who have been enjoying the full ownership of the property listed below, which is valued at Rs. 10,83,000/- (Rupees ten lakh eighty three thousand in words) by paying the Panchayat taxes etc. to them, out of love for you, have chosen it as a reward and given it gratuitously and have given the property listed below in your name on this very day.
1) Maineni Manadi Vishani
2) Maineni Sravani

:: 3 ::
You shall take possession of the Scheduled Property and pay the Panchayat taxes etc. payable thereon in your own name without any dispute with us and you shall enjoy it freely and happily with all the full rights of your son, grandson, heirs, descendants, donation, exchange, sale and other rights as per your wish.
If you enjoy it with all rights, neither you, your heirs, your successors, nor we, our heirs, our successors, will ever be able to make any claim or dispute. We hereby declare to you, and in your name, that we have not made any mortgage, sale, donation, exchange, etc., or any other alienation of the Scheduled Property to anyone, that we have not included it in any court seizure, injunction, or securities, that we have no debts that can bind the Scheduled Property, and that the Scheduled Property is an undisputed and unencumbered property with no rights or liabilities to anyone other than ourselves. 1) Maineni Madhava Nishani
2) Mainani Sravani

Scanned with OKEN Scanner Declaration
We hereby certify that the property transferred by this deed has not been transferred to any other person by way of any agreement, lease, sale, possession, etc.
by registering this deed
it is certified that we have not violated the provisions of section 22-B of the Registration Act, 1908. If such violation is found to have been committed in the future, we shall be fully liable to prosecute us under section 82 of the Registration Act, 1908.
The property entered in the schedule below is not a property within the scope of the A.P. Assigned land (POT) Act 1977 as per Sec
(5) and amended Act 19 of 2007 as per 22-A. We are bound by Sections 27 & 64 of the Stamp Act. This is a deed of immovable property which we have duly signed and given. This declaration is to be understood that in the course of preparing this deed, we have thoroughly examined and included in this deed all the necessary details such as the property in the deed, the link to the place, the details of the parties in the deed, the addresses of the parties, the photographs of the parties, the addresses of the witnesses and their photographs, the details of the property etc. No matter which should have been written or included has been omitted in this deed. The deed has been drawn up after physically examining and measuring the schedule property. We are fully responsible for any deficiency in the stamp duty and any errors or omissions found in the future during the inspection of the property in the said document by the authorities (Registration and Stamp Duty). The Sub-Registrar has no connection with it. This is true. Written by
1) Maineni Madhava Nishani
2) Maineni Sravani

requiredDocuments.docNumber: Gift Settlement Deed executed by  1.Maineni Madavi 2.Maineni Sravani  in favour of Maineni Sambasiva (whereas Son of 1st doner & Brother of 2nd Doner)  vide doc.No.390 of 2026

sections.content: As per Registered Documents: 1.The property in comprised survey number 22, property in bearing house No.5-30, situated in Munugodu Village measuring about 156.44 Sq.Yds., property in bearing house No.5-30, comprised in survey No.22, New Assessment No. 199953001147, Old assessment No. 749 was originally owned by 1.Maineni Madavi 2.Maineni Sravani Who acquired the property through Inheritance from Ancestors. [Ref: Deed] 2.The aforementioned 1.Maineni Madavi 2.Maineni Sravani executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 30/Jan/2026, registered as document No.390 of 2026 before the SRO Krosur(723), in favour of, Maineni Sambasiva (whereas Son of 1st doner & Brother of 2nd Doner), towards the property measuring 156.44 Sq.Yds., bearing house number 5-30, comprised in survey No.22, New Assessment No. 199953001147, Old assessment No.749 situated in Munugodu Village. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1.The Property Tax vide Receipt No.749 dated 19/Mar/2022 imprinted by the bill collector discloses that Maineni Madhavi has paid property tax for the period 2021 to 2022 towards house number 5-30, Assessment No. 749. 2.The Property Tax vide Receipt No.TAX23012026033507609 dated 23/Jan/2026 imprinted by the Munugodu panchayat secretary discloses that Maineni Madhavi has paid property tax for the period 2025 to 2026 towards house number 5-30, New Assessment No. 199953001147, Old assessment No. 749. 3.Encumbrance Certificate vide Statement No.140005456, dated 31/Jan/2026, with respect to the Schedule Property have been provided. We confirm that the said certificate does not reflect any adverse entries.

contentList: Description * Details
In case of Take Over/Balance Transfer from any other Banks/Financial Institutions the List of Documents (LOD) is provided for the above documents * No
Whether title deed of present owner is properly stamped and registered as required under the law? Please provide the details of title deed. * Yes/Gift Settlement Deed
Whether the property/ies has/have been mutated in the name/s of the present owner? Please mention the name of document by which it is ascertain and If not mutated/recorded what remedy? * No
Whether there is any discrepancy in the mutation details and title deed? Please provide(if yes) *NA

Whether requisites Sanctions/ Permissions/ Noc’s/ Plans/ Lay-outs from Competent Authorities under the State/ Central/ Local Laws have been obtained in order to develop/ construction of the property by the Owner/ Developer? Please mention details and If not obtained what remedy? * Unable to determine from given documents

Certificate of Commencement/ Occupation/ Completion/ Possession Receipt have been obtained from competent authorities. Please mentioned details. Whether RERA registration is obtained for the property and details are verified/matched with online portal of RERA. Please mention RERA details (If applicable) * Unable to determine from given documents

Whether permission for conversion of land/plot from Agricultural to Non-Agriculture for Residential/Commercial purpose or other purpose is obtained? Please mention the reference of the same. * Unable to determine from given documents

Whether up to date Property Tax/ Land Revenue Cess is paid to Municipal Corporation/ Panchayat/ Society and other State/Central Govt. Authorities. *Scanned photocopy has been verified and mutation is not in the name of current owner
Whether the property tax receipts have been physically verified and found to be in the name of present owner. If not mutated in the present owner name what remedy? * Yes/No

Whether any of the minor is having interest in the Property offered as mortgage. If so, whether court permission has been obtained for offering the property as security or is yet to be obtained. If not, whether mortgage can be created on the property/ies offered as security. * No
Any Government Claims, Acquisitions, Third Party Claims, Liens etc. and details thereof. * No

Whether the property is involved in or subject matter of any litigation which is pending or concluded? If so, whether such litigation would adversely affect the creation of a valid mortgage or have any implication of its future enforcement? * No, as per given documents

Whether the property is affected by any Local Laws, ULC Law, Tenancy Law, Development Plan, State/Central Laws or other regulations. Whether subject property is falls under prohibitory list/ negative list in the records of the Local/State/Central Govt. or not. If Yes, please share details of the same and what precaution to be taken by the Incred Financial Services Limited in this regard. * No, as per given documents
Whether Permission or NOC from Developer/ Co-operative Housing Society/ State/ Central/ Local Authority or any other person or entity etc. are required before creation of mortgage. * No
Whether Lease Deed has been stamped and registered as required under the law. Please provide details. * NA
Residual period of Lease. * NA
Whether Lessee is permitted to mortgage the Leasehold Right?  * NA
Whether the consent/permission from the Lessor is required for creating the mortgage or not? * NA
Whether premium, lease rent and other dues have been paid to the Lessor by the Lessee up to date or not? Please mention details thereof. * NA
Any other detrimental clause in the lease-deed? * No
Whether the property belongs to any trust or is subject to the rights of any trust? * No
Whether the trust is a private or public trust? * NA

Whether trust deed specifically authorizes the mortgage of the property and trust is having borrowing power to borrower a loan from bank or financial institution for the purpose of trust under trust deed. Please specify the details. * NA
If Yes, additional precautions/permissions to be obtained for creation of valid mortgage? * NA
Any other precautions to be taken before creation of mortgage * No
Whether searches had been conducted at the concerned office at the Sub-Registrar of Assurance for the past 13 years. Please annex the search receipts and search report in respect thereof. * No
Particulars of all registered title deeds offered as security appears in the records of concerned Sub-Registrar of Assurance. * Yes
Whether any charge, encumbrances, defect or adverse entry are found which affect the title of the present owners. * No
Whether online/computer records are available or not and any verification or cross checking are made and the comments/ findings in this regard. * NA
The period covered under the Encumbrance Certificate (EC) and the encumbrances if any, reflected therein. * 43 Years

Whether any subsisting charge on the property/ies offered as security is found in the search of CERSAI or ROC? If yes, state details of charge and whether the charge has been discharged or not. * Unable to determine from given documents

Whether there any subsisting charge on the property/ies offered as security? If yes, state whether such charge has been discharged or not. (Mortgage/ Lis-pendens/ Charge/ Encumbrances/ Attachment/ others) * No, as verified from EC
In case of missing/absence of any original title deeds of the property what precaution to be taken by the Incred Financial Services Limited in this regard. * NA

Whether the Incred Financial Services Limited will be able to enforce SARFAESI Act, if required against the property offered as security. * Yes, subject to the provisions of the Act, Physical verification of the property, and the quantum of the loan.
Whether the local laws or any other law restricts the creation of the Mortgage/ Sale of the property to be mortgaged to the Incred Financial Services Limited. * No
Type of Mortgage recommended for the Property (Equitable Mortgage/ Registered Mortgage) * As applicable
Whether Equitable Mortgage is compulsorily required to be registered or same is to be intimated to concerned Registrar or Sub-Registrar of Assurance or any other authority. * As applicable
Additional suggestions, if any to safeguard the interest of Incred Financial Services Limited/ ensuring the perfection of security. * No
Whether lawyer has verified all original title deeds and documents in respect to the property. * No

Applicable Stamp duty payable for mortgage at the respective state where the property is located - For Simple (Registered) Mortgage. For Deposit of Title Deed i.e. Equitable Mortgage/Memorandum of Deposit of Title Deed (EM/MOE/MODTD). Act and Article Number. Registration Charges for Equitable Mortgage/ Registered Mortgage in the respective state * Out of the scope

sections.content: In view of the aforesaid documents and information furnished before me/us, I/We hereby certify/opinion that Maineni Sambasiva is/are the absolute owners of the aforesaid schedule property and have an absolute, clear and marketable title over the schedule property and mortgage if created will be perfect and available to the Incred Financial Services Limited towards the liabilities of the Borrower.

sections.content: Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the Document Number, Survey Number, and Split Survey Number of the registered SRO as per the Deed. However, verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out in this report due to ongoing EC portal downtime
